另外有興趣想留自己Research Info既巴絲, 希望可以搵到同field既巴打傾下計或者睇下有無potential collaboration, 可以係下面個google doc填自己既資料(optional)
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VAW9av9mt3RnUiYU7t8NhV73P7hc5mTZc1rRccket00/edit?usp=sharing

如果你想分享下報pg經驗，或者知多啲關於報pg嘅嘢，可以入去呢個word：
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-6RuzKFOdboyqvHGpUcDhZpLz833E2m8jEi3FJfnUCI/edit

有興趣係academic 發展，做research既巴絲入黎傾下啦

Phy :
https://journals.aps.org/rmp/abstract/10.1103/RevModPhys.87.981
http://www.phys.sinica.edu.tw/~nano/article/e-04.pdf
Maths:
https://www.jstor.org/stable/1969529?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1063129
https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.07210
Econ: https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Ariel_Rubinstein2/publication/4719889_The_Electronic_Mail_Game_Strategic_Behavior_Under_Almost_Common_Knowledge/links/004635309c7e0b6a58000000.pdf
CS/EE:
http://statweb.stanford.edu/~candes/papers/StableRecovery.pdf
http://math.harvard.edu/~ctm/home/text/others/shannon/entropy/entropy.pdf
Bio:
http://www.nature.com/nbt/journal/v34/n1/full/nbt.3439.html?foxtrotcallback=true
Psychology:
http://journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.1177/0956797611417632
https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/behavioral-and-brain-sciences/article/weirdest-people-in-the-world/BF84F7517D56AFF7B7EB58411A554C17
https://www.nature.com/articles/s41562-017-0189-z
歡迎大家繼續擴充

我依排就係同我老細一齊研究緊d statistics
我undergrad剩係讀過半個sem

考古都有好多範，
家下我做RA跟緊個老細係Archaeological Science, 以實驗為主

而我以前係外國讀書份thesis 仔個老細係Archaeology Theory. 基本上兩樣野黎
皮已收
禁錯icon

已有某Ivy League Engineering PhD offer, full scholarship. spring 2018開學 同老細已經傾好晒. 但仲諗緊去唔去好
一讀讀6年 到時老豆老母頭髮都白埋 又唔可以係女友身邊
自問本身對research個topic都有興趣 但條路真係好長...又唔係對"research"依種工作好大興趣 只係覺得自己比較擅長
身邊所有人都覺得我去硬 如果唔讀我都唔知點
好大壓力

讀完mphil
報緊MPhil，唔識寫career goals and plans
報緊MPhil，唔識寫career goals and plans

報緊MPhil，唔識寫career goals and plans


但grad school都有要求我寫research interest，再寫一次想做咩projects會唔會好重覆
有d迷惘

報緊MPhil，唔識寫career goals and plans


但grad school都有要求我寫research interest，再寫一次想做咩projects會唔會好重覆
有d迷惘
Pish得好快

報緊MPhil，唔識寫career goals and plans


但grad school都有要求我寫research interest，再寫一次想做咩projects會唔會好重覆
有d迷惘

睇下paper 當research proposal咁寫
最緊要唔好寫superficial野 即係個d咩上過邊個course之後好有興趣個d廢話
要好concrete 例如societal needs, current knowledge in the field, 有咩promising evidence/advancement (最好有埋reference)converge to你個idea 好有research價值 要有個big picture話比人知你會點一步步achieve個goal 例如整個gantt chart (外國faculty好中意有gantt chart)
word limit夠多可以講少少methodology
仲要有backup plan, 即係如果你fail to prove/achieve某個concept, 仲有冇第二個perspective/pathway(bio related 既話)
最後解釋有咩potential application去contribute返個field/society
希望幫到你

利申：apply過不下20個programme (Master's, PhD)
MPhil grad左
有Ivy League PhD full scholarship offer
undergrad cGPA<3.4

https://thegradcafe.com/survey/index.php
